[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/6-1.png” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.1″ text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”1.9em” custom_margin=”62px|||||”]

La CRESS vous propose la mise en ligne d’outils réguliers qui peuvent vous servir au quotidien.

N’hésitez pas à nous solliciter si vous avez des besoins ou si vous cherchez des documents spécifiques.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”0|0px|29.6875px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.1″ ul_font=”||||||||” ol_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|700|||||||” header_2_font_size=”56px” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”||20px|” header_2_font_size_tablet=”36px” header_2_font_size_phone=”” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Gestion

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#f85e28″ divider_weight=”3px” _builder_version=”3.22.4″ max_width=”50px”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/GESTION-2.jpg” url=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Modèle-Plan-de-trésorerie-Modèle-Plan-de-trésorerie.pdf” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/GESTION-1.jpg” url=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Moèdele-de-budget-prévisionnel-Modèle-Budget-prévisionnel.pdf” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/GESTION-3.jpg” url=”https://www.isula.corsica/Dispositif-d-aide-aux-associations-entree-commune_a687.html” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”0|0px|29.6875px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.1″ ul_font=”||||||||” ol_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|700|||||||” header_2_font_size=”56px” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”64px||20px|||” header_2_font_size_tablet=”36px” header_2_font_size_phone=”” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Fiches techniques

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#f85e28″ divider_weight=”3px” _builder_version=”3.22.4″ max_width=”50px”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/6-1.jpg” url=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Reglement-general-interne-aides-associations.pdf” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/7-1.jpg” url=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/statuts.pdf” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/8-1.jpg” url=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Fiche-technique_Stratégie-de-communication-pour-votre-association_AssoConnect.pdf” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”0|0px|29.6875px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.1″ ul_font=”||||||||” ol_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|700|||||||” header_2_font_size=”56px” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”64px||20px|||” header_2_font_size_tablet=”36px” header_2_font_size_phone=”” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Focus

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#f85e28″ divider_weight=”3px” _builder_version=”3.22.4″ max_width=”50px”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/14.jpg” url=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Panorama-ESS-Corse-Novembre-20108.pdf” _builder_version=”4.1″ hover_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/12.jpg” url=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/panorama-territorial-web.pdf” _builder_version=”4.1″ hover_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/11.jpg” url=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Panorama-ESS-Corse-territoire-web_février-2015.pdf” _builder_version=”4.1″ hover_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/10.jpg” url=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/focus-10-siae.pdf” _builder_version=”4.1″ hover_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/9.jpg” url=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/focus-silver-economie-web.pdf” _builder_version=”4.1″ hover_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/13.jpg” url=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/13.jpg” _builder_version=”4.1″ hover_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
